name: Talking Hippo Rock
description:
Meet Rock the talking hippo. Rock is your extra-large pet that responds to your touch and repeats everything you say with his funny voice. As he loves to dance he will invite his friends and show you all his different dancing moves. Rock has also a lot of exciting games in his home and he cannot wait to play them with you!
Spend some time with rock and enjoy the time. He will show you some cool moves, his passion for music and al his favorite games.

Talking Hippo Rock is one of the funniest talking animal app - try it out and play it now!

If you like talking animal games like talking cat or talking dog or animal games in general then you will love Talking Hippo Rock!

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ Talking Animal - Talking Hippo
✔ Talking games - animal game
✔ The hippo repeats everything you say with a funny voice
✔ Exciting touch games with many levels like basketball flick, unblock puzzle, match- 3, racing etc.
✔ Many different animations
✔ Amazing soundboard with many funny sentences, sounds from animals, guns etc.

Talking Hippo Rock has been designed for teenagers and adults of all ages.

Talking Hippo Rock is a free application. Download Talking Hippo Rock now and if you like the talking hippo then please rate it with 5 stars.
